PERSONAL DETAILS
Location:		France - Lyon
QUALIFICATIONS
Licence Gestion de projet  Université Lumière Lyon II Sept 2011
BTS Industrialisation des Produits Mécaniques Valence Sept 2010
Languages
French
English – professional level used daily
CAREER SUMMARY
Feb 2012 to Feb 2022 Alfa Laval
Sept 2020 to Feb 2022
Position: Sales Engineer KAM Manager
Responsible for the Environment market, agents, key accounts, framework agreements.
Increased market profitability
Customers: Vinci, Saur, Veolia Suez
May 2017 to Sept 2020
Position: New Sales & Service
Responsible for the France market area, new sales, and service + new sales in the France sector
Gaining market share up to significant investment in Cluster level
Clients: OTV, MSE, Degrémont, STEREAU, BE, MO, ME, Local authorities, Greater Lyon, Vinci, Cabinet Merlin, etc.
Feb 2012 to May 2017
Position: Service Sales Engineer
Service product manager
Client portfolio management, partner management
Implementation of maintenance contracts and national/global framework agreements
Responsible for the Service + activity of the French wine and brewing markets. Work in collaboration with the center located in Sweden (Lund) and Denmark (Nakskov and Soborg)
Establishment of a partnership with a company
Development of the contract activity until the creation of a position “Contract Manager”
Clients: Sanofi, Cargill, Roquette, Vapran, Bucher, local authorities, wine cellars, Lyonnaise des eaux, local authorities, Arkema, Aqualter, Dalkia
COMMENT
10 years of technical-commercial development in multiple fields. Strong ability to animate, structure, and develop a B2B sales sector.
Pragmatic, he was able to rely on his relationship and strength of conviction to carry out the projects entrusted to me and to get the company colleagues to adhere to them. He is motivated and ready to invest himself fully in order to succeed.
Skills
Definition and management of the commercial strategy
Development of activity and partnerships
Technical and commercial negotiations
Management of a network of agents.
Animation of internal teams
Drafting and negotiation of contracts (frameworks)
Management of customer complaints
Management of commercial and competitive intelligence
Marketing and communication relay for the sector
Internal CRM trainer
Assets
Pragmatic
Persevering
Optimistic
Organized
Adaptability
For further information please contact Jan Johnston on 01695 570 696 or email janj@johnston-vere.co.uk
